General.Name: EFORT Intelligent Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: EFORT Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs and manufactures industrial automation equipment in China and internationally. The company provides customers with a range of industrial robot products and robot system integrated solutions. It offers industrial, painting, collaborative, payloads, SCARA, and mini robots. The company's products are used in palletizing, handling, welding, polishing, and spraying functional applications. It serves the food, 3C electronics, home appliance, ceramic, and automobile and component industries. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Wuhu, China.
General.Address: No. 96 Wanchun East Road, Wuhu, China, 241007
